script_maj_table_v9.SCRIPT: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Notes ( id_note INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,Titre VARCHAR(255) NULL, Message VARCHAR (9999) NULL)
